The #bFlyff World Championship#nb is a global competition held until September 7th, 2023. Join this server with boosted Exp and Drops and attempt to win exceptional prizes!

Life Gathering Durability Cost Reduction Event!
Reduces by 1 the durability cost when gathering!
The wandering merchant's renewal will occur 30 minutes earlier during the event!

Achieve each upgrade level of 1~10 once during the event to receive rewards. Upon clearing all 10 stages, receive an Ultimate Accessory Selection Box.
Rates are increased, dungeon cooldowns are reduced, and more! Visit the discord for more information.
